    {
 "testCases": [
  {
   "input": "Hello, How are you?",
   "intent": "intent one"
  },
  {
   "input": "Hello, where are you?",
   "intent": "intent two"
  },
  {
   "input": "Hello, what are you doing?",
   "intent": "intent three"
  }
 ]    
}
                          
                                  {
                               "testCases": [
                                {
                                 "input": "Hello, How are you?",
                                 "intent": "intent one",
                                 "botname":"Bot One"
                                },
                                {
                                 "input": "Hello, where are you?",
                                 "intent": "intent two",
                                 "botname":"Bot Two"
                                },
                                {
                                 "input": "Hello, what are you doing?",
                                 "intent": "intent three",
                                 "botname":"Bot Three"
                                }
                               ]    
                              }

{{'dataset_allowed_syntax_colon'| i18nString}}

  • {{'file_should_be_csv'| i18nString}}
  • {{'file_should_contain_desc1'| i18nString}}
                                    input,intent
                                "Hello, How are you?", "intent one"
                                "Hello, where are you?", "intent two"
                                "Hello, what are you doing?", "intent three"
  • {{'file_should_be_csv'| i18nString}}
  • {{'file_should_contain_desc2'| i18nString}}
                                      input,intent,botname
                                  "Hello, How are you?", "intent one", "Bot Name"
                                  "Hello, where are you?", "intent two", "Bot Name"
                                  "Hello, what are you doing?", "intent three", "Bot Name"
